Global search

Match financial portfolios with climate data

? match_name Match a loanbook and asset-level datasets (ald) by the name_* columns
? prioritize Pick rows where â€˜scoreâ€™ is 1 and â€˜levelâ€™ per loan is of highest â€˜priorityâ€™
? prioritize_level Arrange unique â€˜levelâ€™ values in default order of â€˜priorityâ€™

Datasets for examples and tests

? ald_demo An asset level dataset for demonstration
? classification_bridge, isic_classification, nace_classification, naics_classification Datasets to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes
? data_dictionary Column definitions of all datasets
? iso_codes Countries and codes
? loanbook_demo A loanbook dataset for demonstration
? overwrite_demo A demonstration dataset used to overwrite specific entity names or sectors
? region_isos A dataset outlining various region definitions
? scenario_demo_2020 A prepared climate scenario dataset for demonstration
? sector_classifications A view of available sector classification datasets

Handle dataset snapshots

? possible_snapshots Datasets to snapshot
? take_snapshot Snapshots datasets and the configuration file

Handle the configuration file

? create_config Create a configuration file
? default_config, example_config, get_config Create a path pointing to a configuration file
? edit_config Edit the default configuration file
? show_config Show a configuration file

Demo datasets

These datasets are directly accessible when you attach the package.

? ald_demo An asset level dataset for demonstration
? loanbook_demo A loanbook dataset for demonstration
? overwrite_demo A demonstration dataset used to overwrite specific entity names or sectors
? scenario_demo_2020 A prepared climate scenario dataset for demonstration

Datasets in Reference

These datasets are accessible via functions that get them from a local copy of 2diiâ€™s Dropbox folder.

? BENCH.REGIONS Dataset to bridge from country to all existing bench regions it is in
? INDEX.REGIONS Dataset to identify the equity index regions based on the MSCI factsheets
? BicsSectorBridge Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? GROUPS.GOVT Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? RevenueSplit Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? sector.bridge Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? SectorBridge Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? TYPE.EQUITY Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store
? TYPE.OTHERS Dataset that should probably be removed or outsourced to data store

Paths pointing to 2diiâ€™s dropbox-folder

These datasets are accessible via functions that get them from a local copy of 2diiâ€™s Dropbox folder.

? MASTER.DATA.PATH, FIN.DATA.PATH, CBMARKET.DATA.PATH, DATA.STORE.PATH, ANALYSIS.INPUTS.PATH Create paths to specific 2dii directories, depending on a configuration file
? find_dropbox_2dii, path_dropbox_2dii Easily access directories in your local copy of 2diiâ€™s Dropbox folder
? USER.NAME, DROPBOX.PATH, GIT.PATH, WEBTOOL.PATH, COMPANY.PATH, dbox_port_00, SCENARIO.DATA.PATH, dbox_port2_10proj, EQMARKET.DATA.PATH, MARKET.DATA.PATH, INDEX.DATA.PATH, INDEX.RESULTS.DATA.PATH, FUND.DATA.PATH Create paths to specific 2dii directories

Access configuration parameters

? FINANCIAL.TIMESTAMP, timestamps_datastore_export, ALD.TIMESTAMP, DATASTORE.TIMESTAMP, DATAPREP.TIMESTAMP, START.YEAR, TIME.HORIZON, RISK.YEAR, ADDITIONAL.YEAR, TECH.LIST, TECH.EXCLUDE, SECTOR.LIST, OTHER.SECTOR.LIST, SCENARIO.SOURCES.LIST, IEA.SCENARIO.LIST, WEB.REGION.LIST, SCENARIO.GEOGRAPHIES.LIST, EQUITY.MARKET.LIST, GLOBAL.AGGREGATE.SECTOR.LIST, GLOBAL.AGGREGATE.SCENARIO.SOURCES.LIST, CREATE.META.PORTFOLIO, META.INVESTOR.NAME, META.PORTFOLIO.NAME, HasBV, HasRISK, HasMAP, HasSB, inc_metaportfolio, inc_project_metaportfolio, allowable_asset_list Access parameters from a configuration file
? get_param Create functions to access configuration parameters

Miscellaneous

? degrees Insert the symbol for degrees

? r2dii_packages Return a vector giving the name of r2dii packages
